body:
Hello, I am Dragon. I am a new player on Avicus and would like to get to know you guys, aswell as for you to get to know me!

Dont be afraid to AMA!

Thank you for the welcomes guys!

title: Dragonoid AMA

replies.body: Hey man! welcome to Avicus, make sure to read the rules and have fun!
replies.body_tagged: Hey man! welcome to Avicus, make sure to read the rules and have fun!

replies.body: Hi there! Make sure to check out our PlugDJ! (Its the headphone icon at the bottom right of the website) What's your favorite drink?
replies.body_tagged: Hi there! Make sure to check out our PlugDJ! (Its the headphone icon at the bottom right of the website) What's your favorite drink?

replies.body: Its ironic that you tell me to check the PlugDJ because I actually Mix myself! and my favorite animal is a scorpion and my favorite drink is Redbull!
replies.body_tagged: Its ironic that you tell me to check the PlugDJ because I actually Mix myself! and my favorite animal is a scorpion and my favorite drink is Redbull!

replies.body: Hey there! Welcome to the Avicus Network. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me!
replies.body_tagged: Hey there! Welcome to the Avicus Network. If you have any questions, feel free to contact me!

replies.body: This was actually my brothers account which I took from him when he finished playing. My 1st account was Frankmen but it got hijacked sadly
